reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

description.narrative: Mauritius - HIV - Prévention Information Lutte contre le Sida - PILS. This program has the following goals: Stabilisation of HIV prevalence among Key Population (people who inject drugs (PWID), Men having Sex with Men (MSM), Transgender people (TG), and Sex Workers (SW)). Reduction in AIDS-related mortality. The objectives of this program are: Reach 80% of mapped PWID with HIV prevention education and materials. Reach 42% of mapped MSM with HIV prevention education and material. Reach 41% of mapped transgendered people with HIV prevention education and materials. Reach 49% of mapped sex workers with HIV prevention education and materials. Provide voluntary HIV testing to 20% of combined mapped key populations. Provide ART to 70% of PLHIV eligible to ART and ensure 90% of PLHIV on ART adherent after 12 months
